Card Name: Different drivers have different risk levels, but vehicle insurance pricing is mostly fixed and does not adapt to driving behavior.
Safe drivers feel they are overpaying, while risky drivers are undercharged.
Safe Driver – follows traffic rules, steady speed, low risk
Risky Driver – overspeeding, harsh braking, high risk
New Driver – limited experience, moderate risk
User signs up and installs the insurance app
App tracks driving behavior in real time
Usage-based vehicle insurance that adapts pricing and rewards based on real driving behavior.
